data.title: Air Charter Scotland Airline Profile
data.meta_description: Air Charter Scotland airline profile on Airhex. IATA and ICAO codes, Air Charter Scotland web check-in links
data.text:
Air Charter Scotland quick facts

Type: carrierRegion: EuropeCountry: United KingdomBase airport: Perth AirportYear established: 2003

Airline Overview and Services

Air Charter Scotland Limited marketed as Air Charter Scotland is a currently operating Europen jet/charter airline with a base at Perth Airport, in Perth, United Kingdom.

This carrier's and its 3-character ICAO designator is EDC. Established 21 years ago in 2003, the airline is one of the mature carriers.

Essential Airline Data for Building Travel Products

An airline coding directory with 20 additional data points empowers your travel app with official airline data.

Learn more or download a demo set
